response.overview: A story about the hard life of girl scouts in a pioneer camp. Hot young teen girls go off to summer camp where the physical activities consist of bed hopping with the adult male staff. The way these nubile nymphets sprint from one love nest to the next, it looks like they're in training for an Olympic medal for who can hook up with the most counselors during their short stay. Indeed they become so adept at the game of sex that they're doubling up with two girls to one counselor.  Oh to be that young again... Blood Boy Scouts in a Sex Camp, where every day a good day to fuck!
response.title: Sex Camp for Girl Scouts
